c74object.name: ossia.view
c74object.description: ossia.view allows to bind to a model patcher and define a scope to the ossia.remotes at the same level patcher or below to automatically bind to corresponding ossia.parameters

outlet.name: Info outlet
outlet.description: Messages and information in reply to various messages

objarg.name: Address to bind to
objarg.digest: The address of the node (model) to bind this view to
objarg.description: ossia.view requires an argument defining a node name in the ossia namespace to which it will bind. This will define the scope to which the ossia.remotes at the same level patcher or below will automatically bind to corresponding ossia.parameters. This argument is mandatory, and each ossia.view within a upper-level model, device or client must have a unique name.

method.name: address
method.digest: The address of the node (model) to bind this view to
method.description: The address message followed a node address in the Ossia namespace will make the view bind to the specified node (model)
